question: On page 29, in the 'Advancing water replenishment' section, the text transitions from describing general market challenges to describing Microsoft's specific solution. Identify the first five words of the sentence that marks this start of the solution chunk.

On page 41, column 1 contains two distinct semantic sections: 'Data Methodology' and 'FY24 Results'. Identify the full sentence that serves as the boundary line where the text switches from methodology to results.

On page 45, the narrative shifts from internal packaging improvements to Microsoft's broader supplier engagement strategy. Identify the first sentence of the new chunk under the heading 'Understanding and transforming the packaging landscape'.

On page 13, extract the introductory paragraph immediately following the 'Carbon Table 2' title. Ensure the extraction is free of any page headers, navigation tabs, or document titles located at the top of the page.
On page 49, extract the main body text under the 'Protecting ecosystems' heading. Do not include the '>30%' statistic or the 'Land protection' sidebar text located to the left of the main column.
Extract the full narrative text under the heading 'Replenishment activities' on page 30. Strictly exclude the text inside the blue '+50%' callout box and the chart labels.
On page 29, extract a description of the growth trend shown in the 'Total contracted volume' chart. Specifically, describe the visual difference in growth magnitude between FY22 and FY24.
Refer to the 'Packaging recyclability' chart on page 45. Identify the specific fiscal year where the visual trend reverses and the value drops compared to the year before.
On page 41, visually compare the 'Diverting operational waste' bars to the vertical 90% target line. Extract the fiscal year that comes visually closest to meeting this target.
